text:
[Verse]
Walking down the city street
Music playing on repeat
Sunshine dancing through the trees
Feel the rhythm feel the breeze

[Verse 2]
Woke up with a smile today
Chasing dreams along the way
Footsteps echo can't you see
That's the way it’s meant to be

[Chorus]
Oh we can fly so high
Underneath the big blue sky
Dreams in the sunlight glow
Catch the wave and let it flow

[Verse 3]
Life is just a melody
Sing it loud and you'll be free
Every moment every sound
Miracles are all around

[Bridge]
Close your eyes and take a leap
Dare to dream and dare to keep
All your wishes in your hand
Build a castle in the sand

[Chorus]
Oh we can fly so high
Underneath the big blue sky
Dreams in the sunlight glow
Catch the wave and let it flow
title: Dreams in the Sunlight
